mapper.insert: insert into chat values (null, #{productId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerId}, #{dealType}, null, null);
mapper.update: update chat set last_message_time = #{lastMessageDate} where room_id = ${roomId}
mapper.select: select * from chat where buyer_id = #{buyerId} AND product_id = #{productId}
select * from chat inner join product on chat.product_id = product.product_id where chat.buyer_id = #{memberId} OR product.member_id = #{memberId} order by last_message_time;
select c.*, p.product_name, p.price, p.member_id from product p left join chat c on p.product_id = c.product_id where c.room_id = #{roomId};
